/** * Method that can be called to modify access rights, by calling * {@link java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject#setAccessible} on * the underlying annotated element. *

* Note that caller should verify that * {@link com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.MapperFeature#CAN_OVERRIDE_ACCESS_MODIFIERS} * is enabled before calling this method; as well as pass * force flag appropriately. * * @since 2.7 */
